page.title: 09GAMES AND PASTIMES.
page.content: {Mars:}One person goes it and counts to 200 while everybody hides. You have to try to get in to the den without being seen. If you get a mars you are allowed to pick somebody to hide with you. { Tig:}Two people are allowed to go it.If there are more than three it there are places to rest.The rests are at either end of the playground.If you are caught more than three times you become it.This game ends when one person is left. {High Tig:}ONE person goes it.The other people have to run away and get on something high.They can get caught of high. { White Horses:}One person goes it.Everybody stays still. If the catcher sees you move you go back to the start.These are all the games we play at school.{
